Improving the Quality of Life

The AgaÂ Khan Development Network (AKDN) is dedicated to improving the quality of life of those in need, mainly in Asia and Africa, irrespective of their origin, faith, or gender. Our multifaceted development approach aims to help communities and individuals become self-reliant.


8 million

We receive over eight million medical outpatient visits per year.

2 million

We reach over two million learners each year.

50 million

We provide financial services to over 50 million people.
